thuum_instructor_through_olfrid.name: Find a Thu'um Instructor (Olfrid Addendum)
thuum_instructor_through_olfrid.stakes: Olfrid owes a credible introduction to a legitimate Voice instructor path. Completion means you get a real teacher contact + first meeting arranged.
notes: Progress can tick via Olfrid's networking, Imperial channels, priests/bards, and your public alignment alongside Hadvar.
This avoids pure dungeon-diving for shout progression: teacher supports mastery and provides safer leads.
